entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
